name: teams-archive-inactive-teams
title: List and archives inactive Teams
shortDescription: This script lists and archives all the inactive teams
longDescription: By inputting a designated timeframe for inactivity, the script automatically identifies Teams that have remained dormant beyond the specified period. These Teams are then archived.
